import React, { ChangeEvent, FormEvent } from 'react' import { FormData} from './reducer' import {forms} from './formmodel' interface Props { onInputChange: (e: ChangeEvent) => void onSelectChange: (e: ChangeEvent) => void onSubmit: (e: FormEvent) => void formData: FormData } const Form = ({ onInputChange, onSelectChange, onSubmit, formData }: Props) => { const data = { name : formData['user']['name'], no:formData['family']['states'][0] } console.log(data) return (
{ forms.map((form, index)=>(
)) } {JSON.stringify(formData)}
) } export default Form
